channel.title: Comments on: SquishIt and Nancy – Part Deux
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: Nancy is very fun! I come from ruby and sinatra, but for http://www.volee.it/ i haved to use .net and Nancy + SquishIt helped me very much!!! Try it and smile :)
item.content:encoded:
Nancy is very fun!
I come from ruby and sinatra, but for http://www.volee.it/ i haved to use .net and Nancy + SquishIt helped me very much!!!
Try it and smile ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: I really haven't used it other than for these posts. I do enjoy sinatra, and I'd expect Nancy to track pretty closely with that in terms of smiles per hour. I know Chris uses it a lot - he'd probably be a better person to ask.
item.content:encoded: I really haven’t used it other than for these posts. I do enjoy sinatra, and I’d expect Nancy to track pretty closely with that in terms of smiles per hour. I know Chris uses it a lot – he’d probably be a better person to ask.

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: So is Nancy a lot of fun? I want to give it a go.
item.content:encoded: So is Nancy a lot of fun? I want to give it a go.
